Title: The Equalizer
Writer: Richard Wenk, Michael Sloan (based on the television series created by), Richard Lindheim (based on the television series created by)
Actors: Denzel Washington, Marton Csokas, Chloë Grace Moretz, David Harbour
Plot: A man believes he has put his mysterious past behind him and has dedicated himself to beginning a new, quiet life, before he meets a young girl under the control of ultra-violent Russian gangsters and can't stand idly by.
Production: Escape Artists, Mace Neufeld Productions, Zhiv
